entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shelburne Sandy Point 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %

Dewpoint: -2.5°C

entry.title: Monday night: Drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Drizzle or rain showers changing to periods of light snow after midnight. Fog. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3 except minus 7 in low lying areas.
